¿El pasado de 'Read' se escribe igual que el infinitivo?
content.feedback_correct_es: Sí, se escribe 'read' pero se pronuncia /red/.

content.title: Pronunciation Practice - Module 1 Review
content.instructions: Listen carefully to each sentence and repeat it. Focus on clear pronunciation and natural rhythm.
focusPoints: Clear vowel sounds in key vocabulary

targetSentences.text: This is a review of module one.
targetSentences.phonetic: /ðɪs ɪz ə rɪˈvjuː əv ˈmɒdjuːl wʌn/

targetSentences.text: I want to improve my English.

questions.prompt_es: ¿Qué palabra tiene el acento principal en 'improve'?

content.prompt: Tell me about what you learned in Module 1. What was the most interesting topic for you?
content.expectedResponse: I learned about greetings, introducing myself, and basic conversations. The most interesting topic was learning how to talk about my family.
hints: Mention at least 2 topics from Module 1
Share which topic you found most interesting
